title: Censorship overboard !
body:
To whom it may concern, 

I have been playing this game for quite some time and have now been permanently banned. After the text was sent to me I was shocked at the reasons for a permanent ban. It is ridiculous that swearing in a gaming chat room is not acceptable, especially given you player demographic and other similar gaming conversations. If this is truly the way RIOT would like to operate then I would rather not play this game and suggest the same to my large group of friends who join me. The fact that you so rapidly condemn any mention of homosexuality but the entire cast of your champions is sexualized beyond acceptable measure for a company with the upmost concerns towards "equality" and appropriateness in confusing. Please remember this is a GAME and not a children's cartoon. I would like to have the tribunals review appealed. I have spent alot of time playing this game and the punishment does not fit the conversation. Please address this situation.

Thank you, 
Buksch 

Below is the cause for my permanent ban (unedited for which a kayle ruined the entire game in order just to get personal stats and an S)

Game 1
buksch: lux top u wanna switch ?
buksch: sure
buksch: ty
buksch: %%%
buksch: dobt be that jg pls
buksch: ok tough guy
buksch: pathetic
buksch: no just curious why this garen needs 11 ganks
buksch: kayle
buksch: fuckign do something
buksch: good one
buksch: not really
buksch: ur ass got babysat for 20 mins
buksch: get carried kid
buksch: lol so my counter mage could play u
buksch: u dont need to defend me to the far inferior garen
buksch: kayle
buksch: fuck ur mother
buksch: baron
buksch: oh wait our jg doesnt do that
buksch: fucking retard
buksch: just report kayle
buksch: people like kayle ruin the game for an S
buksch: they fuck their entire team for a reward at the end of the game

The first penalties were warning you that the behavior was unacceptable. In your last penalty, you were told that continuing this would result in a perma-ban. We have a zero tolerance policy against hate speech. You know this, because it was a main cause of your previous penalties.

I invested a lot of time and effort into this account and would like to see this reviewed instead of just stating a blanket nonspecific policy about hate speech. Non of that was hateful it was angry and there was swearing.

If there is a possibility of reassessment, I look forward to hearing from you in an email. Otherwise I would greatly appreciate a response refusing such a request.

And the overall themes of "To Kill a Mockingbird" are the loss of innocence, and racial injustice. How does that apply here? I mean I guess I can understand a parallel between your loss of faith in Riot, and Jem's loss of faith in justice, but that just seems a bit superfluous to the conversation at hand.
